name: Mac Twist to Helicopter
description: Mac Twist with the spiral maintained to Helicopter
minimum: same as Mac Twist and Helicopter

criterias.twisted: must be twisted during the entry, untwisted by the rotation of the Mac Twist
criterias.reverse: immediate transition to a Helicopter in the opposite direction
criterias.devil twist: Twisted during the entry, untwisted during the beginning of the connection, re twisted by the connection to heli. Must stay twisted for minimum 2 turns of heli. Can untwist for the exit
